00074 static void CreateFileWithHeader
00075 (
00076         const string &execId,
00077         const string &celFile,
00078         const string &outFile,
00079         const list<string> &probeSetNames,
00080         const string &algName,
00081         const string &algVersion,
00082         const string &chipType,
00083         const string &programName,
00084         const string &programVersion,
00085         const string &programCompany,
00086         const vector<string>& paramNames,
00087         const vector<string>& paramValues,
00088         const vector<string>& sumNames,
00089         const vector<string>& sumValues
00090 )
00091 {
00092         // Determine the max probe set name.
00093         int numEntries = (int) probeSetNames.size();
00094         int maxProbeSetNameLength = 0;
00095         for (list<string>::const_iterator it=probeSetNames.begin(); it!=probeSetNames.end(); it++)
00096         {
00097                 maxProbeSetNameLength = max(maxProbeSetNameLength, (int) it->length());
00098         }
00099 
00100         // Create the data object
00101         CHPQuantificationData *data = new CHPQuantificationData(outFile);
00102     data->SetEntryCount(numEntries, maxProbeSetNameLength);
00103         data->SetAlgName(StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(algName));
00104         data->SetAlgVersion(StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(algVersion));
00105         data->SetArrayType(StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(chipType));
00106 
00107         // Store the CEL header
00108         if (celFile.length() > 0 && FileUtils::Exists(celFile.c_str()) == true)
00109         {
00110                 FusionCELData cel;
00111                 cel.SetFileName(celFile.c_str());
00112         cel.ReadHeader();
00113             GenericData *gdata = cel.GetGenericData();
00114             if (gdata != NULL)
00115                         data->GetFileHeader()->GetGenericDataHdr()->AddParent(*gdata->Header().GetGenericDataHdr()); 
00116             cel.Close();
00117         }
00118 
00119         // Add algorithm parameters to list.
00120     ParameterNameValueTypeList params;
00121     ParameterNameValueType param;
00122     
00123         if (programName.empty() == false)
00124         {
00125                 param.SetName(L"program-name");
00126                 param.SetValueText(StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(programName));
00127                 data->GetGenericData().Header().GetGenericDataHdr()->AddNameValParam(param);
00128         }
00129 
00130         if (programVersion.empty() == false)
00131         {
00132                 param.SetName(L"program-version");
00133                 param.SetValueText(StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(programVersion));
00134                 data->GetGenericData().Header().GetGenericDataHdr()->AddNameValParam(param);
00135         }
00136 
00137         if (programCompany.empty() == false)
00138         {
00139                 param.SetName(L"program-company");
00140                 param.SetValueText(StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(programCompany));
00141                 data->GetGenericData().Header().GetGenericDataHdr()->AddNameValParam(param);
00142         }
00143 
00144         int nparams = (int) paramNames.size();
00145         param.SetName(L"exec-guid");
00146         param.SetValueAscii(execId);
00147         params.push_back(param);
00148         for(int iparam=0; iparam<nparams; iparam++)
00149         {
00150                 param.SetName(StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(paramNames[iparam]));
00151         param.SetValueAscii(paramValues[iparam]);
00152         params.push_back(param);
00153         }
00154         if (params.empty() == false)
00155                 data->AddAlgParams(params);
00156 
00157         params.clear();
00158         nparams = (int) sumNames.size();
00159         for(int iparam=0; iparam<nparams; iparam++)
00160         {
00161                 param.SetName(StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(sumNames[iparam]));
00162         param.SetValueAscii(sumValues[iparam]);
00163         params.push_back(param);
00164         }
00165         if (params.empty() == false)
00166                 data->AddSummaryParams(params);
00167 
00168         // Creating the writer object will create the file with the header information.
00169         CHPQuantificationFileWriter writer(*data);
00170 
00171         // Write the probe set names.
00172         writer.SeekToDataSet();
00173         ProbeSetQuantificationData entry;
00174         for (list<string>::const_iterator it=probeSetNames.begin(); it!=probeSetNames.end(); it++)
00175         {
00176         entry.name = *it;
00177         entry.quantification = 0.0f;
00178         writer.WriteEntry(entry);
00179     }
00180 }
00181 
00187 static void UpdateQuantifications(const string &outFile, const list<float> &data)
00188 {
00189         // Create the buffer writer object
00190         CHPQuantificationFileBufferWriter expressionQuantificationBufferWriter;
00191         vector<string> fileNames;
00192         fileNames.push_back(outFile);
00193         expressionQuantificationBufferWriter.Initialize(&fileNames);
00194 
00195         // Write the data
00196         for (list<float>::const_iterator it=data.begin(); it!=data.end(); it++)
00197         {
00198                 expressionQuantificationBufferWriter.WriteQuantificationEntry(0, *it);
00199         }
00200 
00201         // Flush the buffer. The destructor will close the file.
00202         expressionQuantificationBufferWriter.FlushBuffer();
00203 }
00204 
00209 static vector<string> ParseLine(char *line)
00210 {
00211         vector<string> tokens;
00212         const char *sep = "\t";
00213         char *token = strtok(line, sep);
00214         while (token != NULL)
00215         {
00216                 tokens.push_back(token);
00217                 token = strtok(NULL, sep);
00218         }
00219         return tokens;  
00220 }
00221 
00227 static void ReadData(const string &inFile, list<string> &names, list<float> &quantifications)
00228 {
00229         // Open the file
00230         ifstream instr(inFile.c_str(), ios::in);
00231         if (!instr)
00232                 throw string("Unable to read the input file");
00233 
00234         // First line with header
00235         char line[1024];
00236         instr.getline(line, 1024);
00237 
00238         // Get the data
00239         names.clear();
00240         quantifications.clear();
00241         while (instr.getline(line, 1024))
00242         {
00243                 vector<string> cols = ParseLine(line);
00244                 names.push_back(cols[0]);
00245                 quantifications.push_back((float)atof(cols[1].c_str()));
00246         }
00247 }
00248 
00250 static void show_help()
00251 {
00252         const char *tab = "\t";
00253         cout << "The command line arguments include" << endl;
00254         cout << tab << "-execid <the execution id>" << endl;
00255         cout << tab << "-cel <the name of the parent cel file>" << endl;
00256         cout << tab << "-in <the name of the input data file, TSV with 1 header row>" << endl;
00257         cout << tab << "-out <the name of the output CHP file>" << endl;
00258         cout << tab << "-arrayType <the probe array type>" << endl;
00259         cout << tab << "-algName <the algorithm name>" << endl;
00260         cout << tab << "-algVersion <the algorithm version>" << endl;
00261         cout << tab << "-programName <the program name>" << endl;
00262         cout << tab << "-programVersion <the program version>" << endl;
00263         cout << tab << "-programCompany <the name of the company>" << endl;
00264         cout << tab << "-paramNames <a list of parameter names>" << endl;
00265         cout << tab << "-paramValues <a list of parameter values>" << endl;
00266         cout << tab << "-sumNames <a list of summary parameter names>" << endl;
00267         cout << tab << "-sumValues <a list of summary parameter values>" << endl;
00268         cout << endl;
00269         cout << "The input file must have the probe set name and quantification values" << endl <<
00270                         "as the first two columns. The paramNames and paramValues arguments are" << endl <<
00271                         "used to specify algorithm parameter." << endl;
00272 }

00275 int main(int argc, char * argv[])
00276 {
00277         try
00278         {
00279                 // Parse the command line arguments.
00280                 CCmdLine cmdLine;
00281                 if (cmdLine.SplitLine(argc, argv) < 1)
00282                 {
00283                         show_help();
00284                         exit(-1);
00285                 }
00286 
00287                 string execId = cmdLine.GetArgument("-execid", 0);
00288                 string celFile = cmdLine.GetSafeArgument("-cel", 0, "");
00289                 string inFile = cmdLine.GetArgument("-in", 0);
00290                 string outFile = cmdLine.GetArgument("-out", 0);
00291                 string arrayType = cmdLine.GetArgument("-arrayType", 0);
00292                 string algName = cmdLine.GetArgument("-algName", 0);
00293                 string algVersion = cmdLine.GetArgument("-algVersion", 0);
00294                 string programName = cmdLine.GetArgument("-programName", 0);
00295                 string programVersion = cmdLine.GetArgument("-programVersion", 0);
00296                 string programCompany = cmdLine.GetArgument("-programCompany", 0);
00297 
00298                 vector<string> paramNames;
00299                 int n = cmdLine.GetArgumentCount("-paramNames");
00300                 for (int i=0; i<n; i++)
00301                         paramNames.push_back(cmdLine.GetArgument("-paramNames", i));
00302 
00303                 vector<string> paramValues;
00304                 n = cmdLine.GetArgumentCount("-paramValues");
00305                 for (int i=0; i<n; i++)
00306                         paramValues.push_back(cmdLine.GetArgument("-paramValues", i));
00307 
00308                 vector<string> sumNames;
00309                 n = cmdLine.GetArgumentCount("-sumNames");
00310                 for (int i=0; i<n; i++)
00311                         sumNames.push_back(cmdLine.GetArgument("-sumNames", i));
00312 
00313                 vector<string> sumValues;
00314                 n = cmdLine.GetArgumentCount("-sumValues");
00315                 for (int i=0; i<n; i++)
00316                         sumValues.push_back(cmdLine.GetArgument("-sumValues", i));
00317 
00318                 // Read the TSV input file
00319                 list<string> names;
00320                 list<float> quantifications;
00321                 ReadData(inFile, names, quantifications);
00322 
00323                 // Create the CHP file.
00324                 CreateFileWithHeader(execId, celFile, outFile, names, algName, algVersion, arrayType,
00325                         programName, programVersion, programCompany, paramNames, paramValues, sumNames, sumValues);
00326                 UpdateQuantifications(outFile, quantifications);
00327         }
00328         catch (string s)
00329         {
00330                 cout << s << endl;
00331                 show_help();
00332         }
00333         catch (int e)
00334         {
00335                 cout << "Invalid argument" << endl;
00336                 show_help();
00337         }
00338         catch (...)
00339         {
00340                 cout << "Unknown error" << endl;
00341                 show_help();
00342         }
00343         return 0;
00344 }
